ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class NotificationInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.NotificationInfo

  • public class NotificationInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity representing an abstract notification. A notification has three text fields: a target, and text to display before and after the target. A NotificationInfo object can be rendered in multiple ways; most likely in a NotificationView, but it could also be converted to a system notification or any other kind of visual form.
    See Also:
    NotificationView
